oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Poster for 10th Anniversary of the Highlander Folk School
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Embracing Citizenship
Civic Engagement
Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Adult education; Working class -- Education
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In 1942, the Highlander Folk School celebrated its 10th anniversary with a full day of barbecue, music and games. Eleanor Roosevelt was the head of the Executive Council that planned the celebration.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Courtesy of Nashville Public Library, Special Collections
